data.lyric:
[ti:365]
[ar:Zedd/Katy Perry]
[al:365]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]365 - Zedd/Katy Perry (凯蒂·佩里)
[00:01.48]Lyrics by：Anton Zaslavski/Katy Perry/Caroline Ailin/Corey Sanders/Daniel Davidsen/Peter Wallevik/Mich Hansen
[00:02.96]Composed by：Anton Zaslavski/Katy Perry/Caroline Ailin/Corey Sanders/Daniel Davidsen/Peter Wallevik/Mich Hansen
[00:04.45]Waking up next to you in the middle of the week
[00:09.23]Never needed anyone to send me off to sleep
[00:13.26]And I know I said go slow
[00:15.68]But I can't hold back no more
[00:19.04]Got a premonition this ain't going to be a fling
[00:23.84]You make a weekend feel like a year
[00:26.48]Baby you got me changing
[00:28.89]24/7 I want you here
[00:31.33]I hope you feel the same thing
[00:33.71]I want you to be the one
[00:34.88]That's on my mind on my mind on my mind
[00:38.65]I want you to be there on a Monday night
[00:41.10]Tuesday night every night
[00:43.56]Are you going to be the one
[00:44.58]That's on my mind 365 all the time
[00:48.47]I want you to be the one to stay
[00:51.18]Nd give me the night and day
[00:55.75]Love it when you come back and can't take it when you leave
[01:00.71]Got me fantasizing our initials already
[01:04.76]And I want to just let go falling deeper than before
[01:10.43]Say that you already lock it up in a heartbeat
[01:15.25]I want you to be the one
[01:16.41]That's on my mind on my mind on my mind
[01:20.29]I want you to be there on a Monday night
[01:22.73]Tuesday Night every night
[01:25.10]Are you going to be the one that's on my mind 365 all the time
[01:30.09]I want you to be the one to stay
[01:32.81]And give me the night and day
[01:35.09]I think about you all the time
[01:39.91]24/7 365
[01:44.77]I think about you all the time
[01:49.65]24/7 365
[02:11.59]I want you to be the one
[02:14.14]I want you to be the one
[02:15.16]That's on my mind on my mind on my mind
[02:19.07]I want you to be there on a Monday night
[02:21.61]Tuesday Night every night
[02:23.86]Are you going to be the one
[02:25.00]That's on my mind 365 all the time
[02:28.85]I want you to be the one to stay
[02:31.59]And give me the night and day
[02:33.74]I think about you all the time
[02:38.68]24/7 365
[02:43.51]I think about you all the time
[02:48.44]24/7 365
data.trans:
[ti:365]
[ar:Zedd/Katy Perry]
[al:365]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.48]//
[00:02.96]//
[00:04.45]某个周三的夜晚我在你身旁醒来
[00:09.23]不需要谁来哄我再次入眠
[00:13.26]我明白我曾说过可以放慢脚步享受其中
[00:15.68]而我再也无法压抑这份感情了
[00:19.04]我有种预感 这段感情可不是一时兴起
[00:23.84]因为见不到你 周末是那样漫长难熬
[00:26.48]亲爱的 你让我焕然一新
[00:28.89]每时每刻 我需要你陪伴左右
[00:31.33]我希望你也有同样感受
[00:33.71]我希望你是我心底的唯一 
[00:34.88]我心底的唯一 心底的唯一 
[00:38.65]我希望每个夜晚都有你的陪伴
[00:41.10]每个夜晚
[00:43.56]你会是那个日日夜夜
[00:44.58]每时每刻我牵挂的唯一么？
[00:48.47]我希望你是那个留在我身边
[00:51.18]陪我度过每分每秒的唯一
[00:55.75]每次你回家我都会欣喜若狂 每次你离开我都难过不已
[01:00.71]我已经开始幻想我们结为夫妇该改的称谓了
[01:04.76]我希望放手过去 毫无保留全心投入这段恋情
[01:10.43]说你的心门 已经为我上了锁吧
[01:15.25]我希望你是我心底的唯一 
[01:16.41]我心底的唯一 心底的唯一 
[01:20.29]我希望每个夜晚都有你的陪伴
[01:22.73]每个夜晚
[01:25.10]你会是那个日日夜夜 每时每刻我牵挂的唯一么？
[01:30.09]我希望你是那个留在我身边
[01:32.81]A陪我度过每分每秒的唯一
[01:35.09]时时刻刻 我都在想你
[01:39.91]//
[01:44.77]每分每秒 我都在想你
[01:49.65]//
[02:11.59]我希望你是我心底的唯一 
[02:14.14]我希望你是我心底的唯一 
[02:15.16]我心底的唯一 心底的唯一 
[02:19.07]我希望每个夜晚都有你的陪伴
[02:21.61]每个夜晚
[02:23.86]你会是那个日日夜夜
[02:25.00]每时每刻我牵挂的唯一么？
[02:28.85]我希望你是那个留在我身边
[02:31.59]A陪我度过每分每秒的唯一
[02:33.74]时时刻刻 我都在想你
